org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render
Class AbstractPanel

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.AbstractPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Panel, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AxisPanel, DatasetLegendPanel, DateRangePanel, ZoomPanel
public abstract class AbstractPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Panel, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

Skeletal implementation of Panel, which also provides some helper methods that subclasses will typically need.

Author:
Chad Takahashi
